conversations.body_text: Hi Mike Jones, Due to delays in the surface finishing of the VAM Pro housing, the first batch of orders is expected to begin shipping between June 16th and 18th. International express shipping will be used, ensuring fast delivery.

Thank you for the update.


On Fri, Jun 13, 2025 at 9:17 PM service@simsonn.com
